boolShell

Class FormularBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • boolShell.FormularBuffer

  • public class FormularBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffer of all saved Formular Formular can be added and removed Can print the last saved Formular which often representates the last command of client
    Author:
    Zabuza
